alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 14 at 5:10AM CST until February 14 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility less than one mile in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Louisiana and southern Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from noon today to 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS... Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility until the fog burns off. Then, gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects as the winds increase. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
